body.name: Wireless Lavalier Microphone for Type-C Phone, Plug-Play Wireless Mic with 2 Microphone for USB-C Android Phone Video Recording, Interview, Vlog, Auto Sync and Noise Reduction…
features: 【Plug & Play and Hands-Free】No Adapter/Addtional APP/ Bluetooth needed, just 2 steps to connect. Step 1: Plug the receiver into your devices; Step 2: Power on the microphones. Say goodbye to messy cables, and the wireless lapel lavalier microphones can be clipped on the collar to free your hands for audio video recording, make your live streaming more relaxed and enjoyable!

【Only for Android Phone with USB-C and OTG】This wireless lavalier microphone can work for android phone with USB-C port. The wireless microphone can work for Youtube, Facebook, Live Stream, Video Recording, Vlog, TikTok, Zoom. Note: Some android phone need open OTG. Feel free to contact us if you don't know how to open it.

【Superior Noise Reduction & Real-time Auto-sync】This omnidirectional wireless lavalier microphone is built with professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips, providing effective identification of the original sound and clear recording in noisy environment. The real-time auto-sync technology extremely reduce the time of video post-editing, supporting a better experience in videos being watched.

【Long Distance Transmission & Long Battery Life】Upgraded wireless microphone transmission technology, 65 feet stable audio signal transmission without cable and harsh noises. The reciever is powered by your device(Can Be Charged At The Same Time), the transmitter built in rechargeable batteries works up to 4-6 hours.

【Warm Tips & 1 Year Warranty 】Please read the user manual and charge the wireless lavalier microphone before using it for the first time.You need to take off the receiver to be able to hear the audio playback. Contact us if it doesn't work. We provide 1 year warranty and 24 hours consult service. Note: Some android phone need open OTG. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions. Roainey

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kindly Tips for Android Devices with USB-C 1. This wireless microphone only compatible with Android Devices with USB-C. Not suitable with iPhone iPad. 2. Some android devices may not connect the wireless mic and not recognize external mics to pick up voice because they are not open cource system. Here are the solution: a. Some android devices may not connect the wireless mic, please open "OTG"(search "OTG" in setting of your phone) to connect. b. Some android devices' own camera not recognize external mics to pick up voice, please download "Open Camera" app to get the camera to recognize external mics (in the setting of the Open Camera).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's simple and it works!
reviews.reviewText: I like to dictate my thoughts during my walks to work in the morning, and the standard, built-in microphone in my phone was just not doing the job I needed it to. I had to hold my phone as if I was on a phone call for the app to understand anything I was saying, and even then, words were getting jumbled though I was talking as clearly as I possibly could. It was time to try a lapel mic, so I bought these.I plugged the receiver into my phone via the USB-C slot, pinned on the lapel mic, and got to walking and talking. At first, I couldn't tell if the mic was on at all because I received no indication from my phone that it had been recognized when I plugged it in, but immediately I could tell a difference as I watched my words being transcribed with little to no errors at all. No more holding my phone; I could keep it safely tucked in my pocket as I got my steps in and my words out. This came with two lapel mics, and I immediately charged both of them. So far, though, I have only needed the one because the thing is holding its battery life well. It's nice to have a backup though in case you don't have time to charge one or you need to record for an extended period.The whole thing came in a nice little carrying case, and I keep it stashed in my backpack for easy access when I want to dictate something with my phone. I mainly use this for dictation, but I've recorded some audio of my daughters as they were playing a game, and the sound quality over the standard microphone in my phone was much better. Everything was clearer and there was less background noise.Oh, one feature I didn't know I needed is that the receiver you plug into your USB-C has a USB-C port on the edge so you can still plug a charger into your phone while you are using this. If you need to charge your phone as you record, it's really easy.I would buy this again or recommend it to anyone who needs something simple and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are perfect for videos
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to connect to my phone. Great sound quality. And I love that it comes with two mics and a cute carrying case

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works good at price
reviews.reviewText: This works well considering the lower price point. And it comes with 2 microphones! Very easy to work. Caverns all outside noise. Would recommend to anyone who uses wants to help move their social media presence along.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound, and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: We use these for doing video interviews. They work great and are very easy to use - just plug in a start recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile wireless microphone system that's great for on-the-go interviews and recordings.
reviews.reviewText: I've used this wireless mic system to capture ad-libs for my music tracks, conduct interviews for my Youtube channel and record monologues.Sound - crisp and clean, great noise reduction, not studio grade, but better than your smartphone mic.Portability - tuck this away in a coat pocket or laptop bag, and you have your mic system ready to go.Be sure to keep the wind screens on.Functionality - I used this on Pixel 3 and Pixel 6a and it works wonderfully, make sure to select bluetooth device under the video record settings and if you're using a pixel phone that has the recorder app, you can select this wireless mic, which is marvelous!Cost - 35 bucks at the time of this review. Great value.Battery life - 2 hours of spoken word. Probably could get more but my mouth's motor starts puttering. Charging is simple and fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked only for three months
reviews.reviewText: I loved it for the first three months while it worked. It was very easy to use and the sound quality was good too. But then it suddenly stopped working.The red light on the receiver is on and the the green light on the microphone is on too but no sound is getting recorded. I have tried to unplug it multiple times and test it with different software but no luck. I guess it only has a life of 3 months. In which case it is an expensive buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I charged both mics for an hour each, no light is showing when I long hold the button and the phone connector is attached. I've looked at video tutorials but nothing works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I am a realtor and I do a lot of videos while on the road and open houses and all that. I had great videos but horrible sound. I feel like I have lived as a cave man not knowing this product is available. After purchasing this I always get compliments from friends of how great my video sounds. This product comes with a little bag so it makes it easier to carry and make sure that you don't lose the parts. I also love that it came with clear instructions. The batter lasts forever I had this for gosh 2months and I only had to charge it once. It also came with a bonus clip and a bonus foam. I would give this product 10 stars if I can. HIGHLY RECOMMEND. It is one of the best business investments that I purchased.
Atendeu minha expectativa. Utilizo para trabalho participando de video conferência. Incrível como funciona perfeitamente. Som muito litido e perfeito. Comprem sem medo.
Perfect little mics, works with good distance, sounds clear.

reviews.reviewText: I like the look of it can't wait to use it, it arrive on tym so can't fault anything atm

reviews.reviewerName: Produto chegou dentro do prazo combinado; ótima qualidade.Produto chegou dentro do prazo combinado; ótima qualidade.
reviews.reviewText: Comprei ontem no final do dia, chegou hoje à tarde. Carreguei as baterias dos microfones, foi bem rápido. Após conectar o receptor na saída USB do meu smartphone, liguei o microfone e fiz um vídeo a uma distância de 3 metros. Funcionou perfeitamente, o som ficou muito bom. Foi como se o telefone estivesse bem próximo de mim.
